name: feathers-client
description: Feathers service clients for REST (jQuery, Request, Superagent) and Websocket (Socket.io, Primus) connections
author: David Luecke <daff@neyeon.com> (https://feathersjs.com)

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist && browserify lib/client.js --standalone feathers --outfile dist/feathers.js
scripts.add-dist: npm run build && git add dist/ --force && git commit -am "Updating dist"
scripts.publish: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run add-dist && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run add-dist && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run add-dist && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run mocha
